data.title: Altkirch and the Sundgau region
data.meta_description: Altkirch comes alive with a host of events during the Enchanted Forest period: concerts, shows, street shows, an open-air skating rink and mapping....
data.text:
Altkirch comes alive with a host of events during the Enchanted Forest period: concerts, shows, street shows, an open-air skating rink and mapping.

The Sundgau Tourist Office adds to the Christmas enchantment by organising guided tours of the Enchanted Forest and a fabric shop.

And to welcome in the New Year, Ferrette and its castle provide a superb backdrop to an unusual New Year's Eve torchlight party!

The principle has remained the same for several years: from 10pm on 31 December, the Sundgau Tourist Office and the Town of Ferrette invite you to take part in a 3km walk around the castle. You will follow a signposted path into the heart of the medieval castle around the New Year's fire, where you can envoy a glass of Crémant with live music.

It is a unique way to celebrate the New Year while breathing the pure and invigorating air of the Jura's foothills!

Christmas markets and events can also be found throughout the Sundgau region, more details on www.sundgau-sudalsace.fr.

Office de Tourisme du Sundgau, Southern Alsace

13 rue du Château

68130 ALTKIRCH

Tél. +33 (0) 389 40 02 90 1a rue de la Première Armée

68480 FERRETTE

Tél. +33 (0) 389 08 23 88
